entry.title: Today in DeFi - Trove Supports Arbitrum Nova, Uniswap Permit2 & Universal Router, Intro to LemmaSwap, and More...
entry.summary: Trove Supports Arbitrum Nova Trove, the NFT marketplace built around TreasureDAO ecosystem, now supports GameFi projects built on Arbitrum Nova, a gaming and social app-focused L2. Uniswap Permit2 & Universal Router Uniswap launches two infrastructure contracts: Permit2 that allows token approvals to be shared and managed across dApps; Universal Router that unifies ERC20 and NFT swapping into a single swap router.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - LemmaSwap V2 Live, USDV Depeg, Intro to BendDAO, and More...
entry.summary: LemmaSwap V2 Live on Optimism Lemma launches a new swap protocol on Optimism. LemmaSwap allows traders to execute spot swaps using Perpetual Protocol’s liquidity and allows LPs to earn yield from spot trading fees and funding rate PnL. USDV Depeg USDV, the stablecoin on the Velas chain, lost over 99% of its value after a 10B token dump on the Velas-based DEX WagyuSwap.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Genesis Halts Withdrawals, Maker Teleport, Intro to Bebop, and More...
entry.summary: Genesis Lending Halts Withdrawals As part of the fallout from FTX, Genesis Trading has halted withdrawals of its lending product. This may have ramifications for Gemini’s Earn program, which uses Genesis. Maker DAI Teleport Maker launches Teleport - infrastructure for projects to utilize and transfer DAI across multichains. Maker also set up a 19k DAI integration grant for developers to create a front end for this back end technology.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Atom 2.0 Rejected, Nike NFTs Coming to Polygon, Intro to Sentiment.xyz, and More...
entry.summary: Atom 2.0 Rejected The vote for Proposal 82 (Atom 2.0) vote has been rejected. The proposal called for a number of radical changes including Social Coordination Technology Interchain Security, Liquid Staking, as well as changes to issuance(potentially what caused the contention).

entry.summary: Recap: Week of Nov. 7th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aptos x Google Cloud, DFX Reentrancy Exploit, WooFi Arbitrum Farming, and More...
entry.summary: Aptos x Google Cloud Google Cloud will validate nodes and participate on the Aptos mainnet, and Aptos blockchain will also be indexed and made available on Google Cloud's BigQuery service. Both parties are also set to launch an accelerator program as well as co-host a hackathon.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - FTX Situation, MetaMask Bridges, Intro to Grizzly, and More...
entry.summary: FTX Situation Update Today Binance stated it will not pursue the FTX deal due to their DD. Primary holdings of FTX/Alameda (besides stables) include $FTT, SOL, SRM, BIT, xSUSHI, LDO, etc. and investments of FTX ventures include $NEAR, APE, APT, MINA, HNT, etc

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Binance FTX Potential Merger, Bebop Live, Inverse DBR Airdrop, and More...
entry.summary: Binance FTX Potential Merger On Nov. 2nd, Coindesk reported on a leaked balance sheet from Alameda Research, which maintains close ties with FTX. On Sunday night, Binance's CEO sent a tweet about selling FTT. FTX users started to withdraw amounts in big amounts, causing a liquidity crunch on the exchange. FTX was then forced to sell part of its crypto holdings to keep the reserve from depletion.

entry.title: Learn from my mistakes
entry.summary: Projects

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Solana Layer N, Neon EVM, Incentivized Auto-compounding, and More...
entry.summary: Upcoming: Solana Layer N Solana scaling Protocol Layer N is scheduled for mainnet launch next year. Layer N aims to be the first blockchain to match the throughput of a centralized exchange. Upcoming: Neon EVM Neon Labs sets to launch Neon EVM, the first EVM on solana to mainnet on Dec. 12th. Neon EVM will allow devs to port Ethereum-based dApps on top of Solana.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - GameStop NFT Marketplace Live, Google Cloud x Solana, Meta Instagram NFTs Coming, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Oct. 31st

entry.title: Today in DeFi - FTX Ventures Bets Lens, PancakeSwap Live on Aptos, Intro to Tranches, and More...
entry.summary: FTX Ventures Bets Lens FTX Ventures is reportedly to invest in Lens, the social media protocol built by Aave. PancakeSwap Live on Aptos PancakeSwap has enabled trading for a few USDC pairs on Aptos and will launch incentivized farms soon. Chainlink Low-Latency Oracle

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Meta NFTs Mint & Sell, MetaMask in Games, Sommelier Strategy Tokens, and More...
entry.summary: Meta NFTs Mint & Sell Meta announces it will enable mint & sell NFTs on Instagram. The first chain to support is Polygon, with NFT collections stored on Arweave. MetaMask in Games MetaMask will be injected into games supported by the partner stores. Players will be able to carry their wallets, tokens, NFTs, and achievements into every game with web3 capabilities.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - BobaBNB L2, MakerDAO Polling to Onboard Compound D3M, Intro to Dexible, and More...
entry.summary: Boba BNB L2 Multichain L2 network Boba integrated with BnB Chain and launched BobaBNB L2. A bunch of defi projects including Sushiswap will be deployed on BobaBNB soon. MakerDAO Polling to Onboard Compound D3M MakerDAO is polling to onboard parameters to activate Compound D3M. If passed and approved, a $160m DAI Debt Ceiling and a 2% Target Borrow Rate will be deployed, bringing ~$1.8m DAI in annual revenue to Maker.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - GameStop NFT Marketplace Live, Gearbox V2 Live, Intro to LlamaLend, and More...
entry.summary: GameStop NFT Marketplace Live Leading video game retailer GameStop launches its NFT marketplace on ImmutableX. Gearbox V2 Live Generalized leverage protocol Greabox launches V2, making leverage trading more efficient and secure. Along with the upgrade, the two LMs (passive LP LM & CA LM) are also live for farmers.
